mapper.select: SELECT b.id bid, b.description bdescription, b.create_time bcreateTime, b.duration bduration, b.real_duration brealDuration, b.status bstatus, b.project_id bprojectId, u.username uusername, u.pwd upwd, u.name uname, u.icon uicon, u.tel utel, u.status ustatus FROM block b, project p, user u WHERE b.project_id = #{projectId} AND b.leader_id = u.username AND b.project_id = p.id
